mapper.select: SELECT mat.mat_id AS id, mat.mat_code AS code, mat.mat_date AS date, mat.mat_description AS description, mat.mat_num_players_min AS numPlayersMin, mat.mat_num_players_max AS numPlayersMax, mat.mat_carpooling_enabled AS carpoolingEnabled, mat.mat_code_sharing_enabled AS codeSharingEnabled, sit.sit_id AS siteId, sit.sit_name AS siteName, sit.sit_address AS siteAddress, sit.sit_phone_number AS sitePhoneNumber, sit.sit_latitude AS siteLatitude, sit.sit_longitude AS siteLongitude, cre.ply_id AS creatorId, cre.ply_surname AS creatorSurname, cre.ply_first_name AS creatorFirstName, cre.ply_email AS creatorEmail, pma.pma_match_id AS matchId, pma.pma_player_id AS playerId, ply.ply_first_name AS playerFirstName, ply.ply_email AS playerEmail, car.car_id AS carId, car.car_num_seats AS carNumSeats FROM t_match mat JOIN t_site sit ON mat.mat_site_id = sit.sit_id JOIN t_player cre ON mat.mat_creator_id = cre.ply_id LEFT JOIN t_player_match pma ON mat.mat_id = pma.pma_match_id LEFT JOIN t_player ply ON pma.pma_player_id = ply.ply_id LEFT JOIN t_car car ON pma.pma_car_id = car.car_id WHERE mat.mat_code = #{code}

SELECT mat.mat_id AS id, mat.mat_code AS code, mat.mat_date AS date, mat.mat_description AS description, mat.mat_num_players_min AS numPlayersMin, mat.mat_num_players_max AS numPlayersMax, mat.mat_carpooling_enabled AS carpoolingEnabled, mat.mat_code_sharing_enabled AS codeSharingEnabled, cre.ply_id AS creatorId, cre.ply_surname AS creatorSurname, cre.ply_first_name AS creatorFirstName, cre.ply_email AS creatorEmail, sit.sit_id AS siteId, sit.sit_name AS siteName, sit.sit_address AS siteAddress, sit.sit_phone_number AS sitePhoneNumber, sit.sit_latitude AS siteLatitude, sit.sit_longitude AS siteLongitude FROM t_match mat JOIN t_site sit ON mat.mat_site_id = sit.sit_id JOIN t_player cre on mat.mat_creator_id = cre.ply_id WHERE mat.mat_id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
SELECT NEXTVAL('s_match') AS id;
INSERT INTO t_match ( mat_id, mat_date, mat_description, mat_num_players_min, mat_num_players_max, mat_site_id, mat_code, mat_created_at, mat_carpooling_enabled, mat_code_sharing_enabled, mat_creator_id ) VALUES ( #{match.id}, #{match.date}, #{match.description}, #{match.numPlayersMin}, #{match.numPlayersMax}, #{match.site.id}, #{match.code}, NOW(), #{match.carpoolingEnabled}, #{match.codeSharingEnabled}, #{match.creator.id} )

choose.otherwise: INSERT INTO t_player_match (pma_match_id, pma_player_id, pma_car_id) VALUES (#{match.id}, #{player.id}, #{car.id})

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_player_match WHERE pma_player_id = #{player.id} AND pma_match_id = #{match.id}
